title: poruLAi iruppEnO oru poruLAi
sahitya:
poruLAi iruppEnO oru poruLAi iruppEnO bhOgamum yAgamum yOgamum vENDAm punitamAna 
pala piravigaL vENDam Agamam arinda tanmaiyum vENDAm inda Ayarkula mAdargaLin pAdam 
paDumAna oru poruLAi iruppEnO inda punitamAna gopiyar pAdam paDa pullO kallO maNNO EdEnum oru


anupallavi

  aruLAna tavam sheyya iham viDavENum ashaiyAdu aindaDakki yOgam sheyyavENum
iruLAnA bhavam enru eTTittaLLa vENum ittanaikkum innavar mun IDO sODO kANum


caraNam    meyyuLLar enrAl adu innavarkkE Aghum mettat-tavap-pala ivargaL kaimElE Aghum 
ayyanivan kathai mElE azhiyAda mOham Anavarkku janmangaLAl enna tAn Aghum
					(madhyamakAla)
Amaratti muttut-tayir kaDaiyum aluvalAna verum gOpiyar engE AgamamAnadu tEDit-tEDi 
alaindAshai viDAda pErALanum engE dAra muraipaDavum tayirO tayir enra taruNiyar engE 
talaivanum engE tanakku nigharAga ninrAnE ingE sarikku sariyAga nAnavadingE oru
